name: Intella, LTD
description: Developer of a cloud-based on-demand insights platform designed to deliver real-time consumer insights and create surveys. The company's platform uses a proprietary algorithm to come up with key findings and insights from market research methods like surveys and focus groups and offers analytical tools for real-time response analytics and data visualization to reach and engage with hard-to-find consumer profiles, enabling clients to track their brand equity and optimize their brand performance.
one_liner: Developer of a cloud-based on-demand insights platform designed to deliver real-time consumer insights and create surveys. The company's platform uses a proprietary algorithm to come up with key findings and insights from market research methods like surveys and focus groups and offers analytical tools for real-time response analytics and data visualization to reach and engage with hard-to-find consumer profiles, enabling clients to track their brand equity and optimize their brand performance.
